AbilityStacking1.title: Ability Stacking Common
AbilityStacking1.description: Ability cooldowns loop to gain 1 extra charge. Ability cooldowns are 20% slower for all Monkeys except Psi

AbilityStacking2.description: Ability cooldowns loop to gain 2 extra charges. Ability cooldowns are 20% slower for all Monkeys except Psi

AbilityStacking3.title: Ability Stacking Legendary

AbsoluteAbility3.title: Absolute Ability Legendary

CatsMeow1.title: Cats Meow Rare
CatsMeow1.description: Maximum lives is set to 9, but any Bloon leaked only counts as 1 life regardless of RBE. Regenerate 3 lives at the end of each round. Adds a 0-0-3 Bomb Shooter to your Party

CatsMeow2.title: Cats Meow Legendary
CatsMeow2.description: Maximum lives is set to 9, but any Bloon leaked only counts as 1 life regardless of RBE. Regenerate 9 lives at the end of each round.  Adds a 0-0-4 Bomb Shooter to your Party

CeramicChunker3.title: Ceramic Chunker Legendary

ColdSteel1.description: Military Monkeys tier 3 or higher have a 5% chance to freeze Bloons they hit

CorneredBeasts1.title: Cornered Beasts Common
CorneredBeasts1.description: Beast Handlers tier 3 and higher have 20% more range, and attack faster the more Bloons in radius (up to 25%). Adds a 0-1-1 Beast Handler to your Party

CorneredBeasts2.title: Cornered Beasts Rare
CorneredBeasts2.description: Beast Handlers tier 3 and higher have 20% more range, and attack faster the more Bloons in radius (up to 35%). Adds a 0-2-1 Beast Handler to your Party

CorneredBeasts3.title: Cornered Beasts Legendary
CorneredBeasts3.description: Beast Handlers tier 3 and higher have 20% more range, and attack faster the more Bloons in radius (up to 50%). Adds a 0-2-0 Beast Handler to your Party

CorrosiveTorpEDarts1.title: Corrosive Torp-E-Darts Common
CorrosiveTorpEDarts1.description: Tier 3 and higher Monkey Subs glue Bloons with Bloon Dissolver acid for a short time. Adds a 0-1-1 Monkey Sub to your Party

CorrosiveTorpEDarts2.title: Corrosive Torp-E-Darts Rare
CorrosiveTorpEDarts2.description: Tier 3 and higher Monkey Subs glue Bloons with Bloon Liquifier acid for a short time. Adds a 0-2-1 Monkey Sub to your Party

CorrosiveTorpEDarts3.title: Corrosive Torp-E-Darts Legendary

CriticalImpact2.title: Critical Impact Rare
CriticalImpact2.description: Tier 3 and higher Mortars have a 1 in 8 chance to Crit for 350% damage. Adds a 2-1-0 Mortar to your Party

CriticalImpact3.title: Critical Impact Legendary
CriticalImpact3.description: Tier 3 and higher Mortars have a 1 in 8 chance to Crit for 500% damage. Adds a 2-0-0 Mortar to your Party

CriticalSuccess1.description: Primary Monkeys attack reload time increased 75%, but gain a 1 in 10 chance to Crit for 900% damage

CriticalSuccess2.title: Critical Success Legendary
CriticalSuccess2.description: Primary Monkeys attack reload time increased 75%, but gain a 1 in 10 chance to Crit for 1100% damage

CrystalCrash1.description: Support Monkeys deal 2 times damage to frozen Bloons

CrystalCrash2.description: Support Monkeys deal 2.5 times damage to frozen Bloons

CrystalCrash3.title: Crystal Crash Legendary
CrystalCrash3.description: Support Monkeys deal 3 times damage to frozen Bloons

DazingFrostburn1.title: Dazing Frostburn Common
DazingFrostburn1.description: Ice Monkeys attack 50% slower, but also stun non-MOAB Bloons and burn 4 damage a second for 10 seconds. Adds a 1-0-1 Ice Monkey to your Party

DazingFrostburn2.title: Dazing Frostburn Rare
DazingFrostburn2.description: Ice Monkeys attack 50% slower, but also stun non-MOAB Bloons and burn 8 damage a second for 10 seconds. Adds a 1-0-2 Ice Monkey to your Party

DazingFrostburn3.title: Dazing Frostburn Legendary
DazingFrostburn3.description: Ice Monkeys attack 50% slower, but also stun non-MOAB Bloons and burn 16 damage a second for 10 seconds. Adds a 0-0-2 Ice Monkey to your Party

DivineIntervention1.title: Divine Intervention Common
DivineIntervention1.description: Super Monkeys and Adora have a 1 in 1800 chance when hitting Bloons for the Sun God to smite them with 1500x damage. Adds a 0-0-0 Super Monkey to your Party

DivineIntervention2.title: Divine Intervention Rare
DivineIntervention2.description: Super Monkeys and Adora have a 1 in 1200 chance when hitting Bloons for the Sun God to smite them with 1500x damage. Adds a 0-0-0 Super Monkey to your Party

DivineIntervention3.title: Divine Intervention Legendary
DivineIntervention3.description: Super Monkeys and Adora have a 1 in 600 chance when hitting Bloons for the Sun God to smite them with 1500x damage. Adds a 0-0-0 Super Monkey to your Party

DreamTeams2.title: Dream Teams Rare
DreamTeams2.description: Monkey Subs, Ninja Monkeys, Druids, Wizards, and Beast Handlers have faster attack speed and ability cooldowns, and 35% more range.

DreamTeams3.title: Dream Teams Legendary
DreamTeams3.description: Monkey Subs, Ninja Monkeys, Druids, Wizards, and Beast Handlers have faster attack speed and ability cooldowns, and 50% more range.

EnchantedRebuttal1.title: Enchanted Rebuttal Common
EnchantedRebuttal1.description: Magic Monkeys push Bloons back on hit

EnchantedRebuttal2.title: Enchanted Rebuttal Rare
EnchantedRebuttal2.description: Magic Monkeys push Bloons back even more on hit

EnchantedRebuttal3.title: Enchanted Rebuttal Legendary
EnchantedRebuttal3.description: Magic Monkeys push Bloons and small MOAB-class back on hit

EsotericElementalist1.title: Esoteric Elementalist Common
EsotericElementalist1.description: Wizard Monkeys have a 20% chance to freeze or blow back, and set Bloons on fire for 1 damage/s over 4.5s. Adds a 1-0-1 Wizard to your Party

EsotericElementalist2.title: Esoteric Elementalist Rare
EsotericElementalist2.description: Wizard Monkeys have a 30% chance to freeze or blow back, and set Bloons on fire for 3 damage/s over 4.5s. Adds a 2-0-1 Wizard to your Party

EsotericElementalist3.title: Esoteric Elementalist Legendary
EsotericElementalist3.description: Wizard Monkeys have a 60% chance to freeze or blow back, and set Bloons on fire for 9 damage/s over 4.5s. Adds a 2-0-0 Wizard to your Party

EssenceOfBlastapopoulos1.title: Essence Of Blastapopoulos
EssenceOfBlastapopoulos1.description: Tier 5 Monkeys and level 20 Heroes burn Bloons, and affected Bloons take an extra +4 damage from all sources

EssenceOfBloonarius1.title: Essence Of Bloonarius
EssenceOfBloonarius1.description: All Monkeys tier 3 and lower deal 1.5x damage to Bloons and MOAB-Class Bloons and have 100% more pierce

EssenceOfDreadbloon1.title: Essence Of Dreadbloon
EssenceOfDreadbloon1.description: All Monkeys count as all categories. Tier 5 Monkeys and level 20 Heroes deal 1.5x damage to Fortified and Ceramic Bloons

EssenceOfLych1.title: Essence Of Lych
EssenceOfLych1.description: Tier 5 Monkeys and level 20 Heroes projectiles create clouds that trojan regular Bloons, stopping them from spawning children. Recover 10 lives each round for every tier 3 or higher Monkey on the field. Recover 5 lives for every ability used

EssenceOfPhayze1.title: Essence Of Phayze
EssenceOfPhayze1.description: All Monkeys can see Camo, and deal triple damage to Camo Bloons. Heroes slow Bloons in their radius by 30%

EssenceOfVortex1.title: Essence Of Vortex
EssenceOfVortex1.description: Tier 5 Monkeys and level 20 Heroes knock back MOAB-Class Bloons on hit, and 10% chance to blow back regular Bloons

ExplosiveEconomics1.title: Explosive Economics Common
ExplosiveEconomics1.description: When Support Monkeys are sold, an Area of Effect explosion deals 100 damage to all nearby Bloons. Bloons in range of Support Monkeys give 5% less cash

ExplosiveEconomics2.title: Explosive Economics Rare
ExplosiveEconomics2.description: When Support Monkeys are sold, an Area of Effect explosion deals 300 damage to all nearby Bloons. Bloons in range of Support Monkeys give 5% less cash

ExplosiveEconomics3.title: Explosive Economics Legendary
ExplosiveEconomics3.description: When Support Monkeys are sold, an Area of Effect explosion deals 900 damage to all nearby Bloons. Bloons in range of Support Monkeys give 5% less cash

FataMorgana1.title: Fata Morgana Common
FataMorgana1.description: Mermonkey range, pierce, projectile lifespan, and ability cooldown speed increased 25%. Mermonkey projectiles reflect off map borders. Adds a 0-1-1 Mermonkey to your Party

FataMorgana2.title: Fata Morgana Rare
FataMorgana2.description: Mermonkey range, pierce, projectile lifespan, and ability cooldown speed increased 35%. Mermonkey projectiles reflect off map borders. Adds a 0-2-1 Mermonkey to your Party

FataMorgana3.title: Fata Morgana Legendary
FataMorgana3.description: Mermonkey range, pierce, projectile lifespan, and ability cooldown speed increased 50%. Mermonkey projectiles reflect off map borders. Adds a 0-2-0 Mermonkey to your Party

FlamingHotPunchARang1.title: Flaming Hot Punch-A-Rang Common
FlamingHotPunchARang1.description: Red Hot Rangs have reduced pierce, but knock back Bloons and have a 30% chance to set them on fire for 3 damage per 1.5s over 4.5s. Adds a 0-1-1 Boomerang Monkey to your Party

FlamingHotPunchARang2.title: Flaming Hot Punch-A-Rang Rare
FlamingHotPunchARang2.description: Red Hot Rangs have reduced pierce, but knock back Bloons and have a 30% chance to set them on fire for 6 damage per 1.5s over 4.5s. Adds a 0-1-2 Boomerang Monkey to your Party

FollowMe1.title: Follow Me Common
FollowMe1.description: Dart Monkeys, Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Tack Shooters, Super Monkeys, Druids, and Mermonkeys follow cursor like a Dartling Gunner with a turn rate of 180, and constantly fire as long as Bloons are on screen. Attack speed reduced by 20%

FollowMe2.title: Follow Me Rare
FollowMe2.description: Dart Monkeys, Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Tack Shooters, Super Monkeys, Druids, and Mermonkeys follow cursor like a Dartling Gunner with a turn rate of 300, and constantly fire as long as Bloons are on screen. Attack speed reduced by 10%

FollowMe3.title: Follow Me Legendary
FollowMe3.description: Dart Monkeys, Boomerang Monkeys, Bomb Shooters, Tack Shooters, Super Monkeys, Druids, and Mermonkeys follow cursor like a Dartling Gunner with a turn rate of 500, and constantly fire as long as Bloons are on screen. Attack speed reduced by 5%

FrostedTips1.title: Frosted Tips Common
FrostedTips1.description: Dart Monkey pierce and range increased 15%, and projectiles apply permafrost, slowing Bloons by 50%. Adds a 1-1-0 Dart Monkey to your Party

FrostedTips2.title: Frosted Tips Rare
FrostedTips2.description: Dart Monkey pierce and range increased 20%, and projectiles apply permafrost, slowing Bloons by 50%. Adds a 2-1-0 Dart Monkey to your Party

FrostedTips3.title: Frosted Tips Legendary
FrostedTips3.description: Dart Monkey pierce and range increased 35%, and projectiles apply permafrost, slowing Bloons by 50%. Adds a 2-0-0 Dart Monkey to your Party

GrowingSteady1.description: Druids attack reload time is increased 20%, but every round, Druid damage is increased by 0.15, even Druids placed later! Adds a 1-0-1 Druid to your Party

GrowingSteady2.title: Growing Steady Rare
GrowingSteady2.description: Druids attack reload time is increased 20%, but every round, Druid damage is increased by 0.20, even Druids placed later! Adds a 1-0-2 Druid to your Party

GrowingSteady3.title: Growing Steady Legendary
GrowingSteady3.description: Druids attack reload time is increased 20%, but every round, Druid damage is increased by 0.35, even Druids placed later! Adds a 0-0-2 Druid to your Party

HeightenedPerception1.description: Primary Monkeys attack range increased 40%. Projectile speed reduced 50%

HeightenedPerception3.title: Heightened Perception Legendary

HighImpactGlue1.title: High Impact Glue Common
HighImpactGlue1.description: Glue Gunner projectiles move twice as fast and deal 2 damage on impact. Impact damage scales up to 10x with the amount of Bloons on screen. Adds a 1-0-1 Glue Gunner to your Party

HighImpactGlue2.title: High Impact Glue Rare
HighImpactGlue2.description: Glue Gunner projectiles move twice as fast and deal 3 damage on impact. Impact damage scales up to 10x with the amount of Bloons on screen. Adds a 2-0-1 Glue Gunner to your Party

HighImpactGlue3.title: High Impact Glue Legendary
HighImpactGlue3.description: Glue Gunner projectiles move twice as fast and deal 6 damage on impact. Impact damage scales up to 10x with the amount of Bloons on screen. Adds a 2-0-0 Glue Gunner to your Party

HomeBrewAlchemy1.title: Home Brew Alchemy Common
HomeBrewAlchemy1.description: Alchemist attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 20% with a 1 in 20 chance to Crit for 50x damage. Adds a 1-0-1 Alchemist to your Party

HomeBrewAlchemy2.title: Home Brew Alchemy Rare
HomeBrewAlchemy2.description: Alchemist attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 30% with a 1 in 20 chance to Crit for 50x damage. Adds a 1-0-2 Alchemist to your Party

HomeBrewAlchemy3.title: Home Brew Alchemy Legendary
HomeBrewAlchemy3.description: Alchemist attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 50% with a 1 in 20 chance to Crit for 50x damage. Adds a 0-0-2 Alchemist to your Party

IntelligenceAgent1.title: Intelligence Agent Common
IntelligenceAgent1.description: Heroes give Monkey Intelligence Bureau buff to nearby Monkeys (can hit all Bloon types) but those monkeys attack reload time is increased 50%

JustLikeMagic1.description: Tier 5 Magic Monkeys' attack speed is halved, but all Monkeys in their radius deal 25% more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons

JustLikeMagic2.title: Just Like Magic Rare
JustLikeMagic2.description: Tier 5 Magic Monkeys' attack speed is halved, but all Monkeys in their radius deal 30% more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons

JustLikeMagic3.description: Tier 5 Magic Monkeys' attack speed is halved, but all Monkeys in their radius deal 50% more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons

MaliciousMauling1.title: Malicious Mauling Common
MaliciousMauling1.description: Bomb Shooters and Striker Jones deal 3x damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Bomb Shooters attack speed and projectile speed is halved. Adds a 0-1-1 Bomb Shooter to your Party

MaliciousMauling2.title: Malicious Mauling Rare
MaliciousMauling2.description: Bomb Shooters and Striker Jones deal 4x damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Bomb Shooters attack speed and projectile speed is halved. Adds a 0-2-1 Bomb Shooter to your Party

MaliciousMauling3.title: Malicious Mauling Legendary
MaliciousMauling3.description: Bomb Shooters and Striker Jones deal 6x damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Bomb Shooters attack speed and projectile speed is halved. Adds a 0-2-0 Bomb Shooter to your Party

AbundantChoices1.title: Abundant Choices Rare
AbundantChoices1.description: Get 1 extra choice when picking a Boost, Artifact, or new Monkey

AbundantChoices2.title: Abundant Choices Legendary
AbundantChoices2.description: Get 2 extra choices when picking a Boost, Artifact, or new Monkey

MightyMulligan1.title: Mighty Mulligan Common
MightyMulligan1.description: Provides 1 Artifact Selection reroll opportunity after beating a reward tile

MightyMulligan2.title: Mighty Mulligan Rare
MightyMulligan2.description: Provides 2 Artifact Selection reroll opportunity after beating a reward tile

MightyMulligan3.title: Mighty Mulligan Legendary
MightyMulligan3.description: Provides 3 Artifact Selection reroll opportunity after beating a reward tile

NoMorePlease1.title: No More Please Rare
NoMorePlease1.description: Ban a Monkey from being offered as an Insta Monkey choice for the rest of the campaign. Option to Ban appears when next offered a choice of Insta Monkey. This Artifact has only 2 charges & is Banished after use

NoMorePlease2.title: No More Please Legendary
NoMorePlease2.description: Ban a Monkey from being offered as an Insta Monkey choice for the rest of the campaign. Option to Ban appears when next offered a choice of Insta Monkey. This Artifact has only 4 charges & is Banished after use

Portability1.title: Portability Common
Portability1.description: Grants 1 Portable Lake and Pontoon per tile

Portability2.title: Portability Rare
Portability2.description: Grants 2 Portable Lake and Pontoon per tile

Portability3.title: Portability Legendary
Portability3.description: Grants 3 Portable Lake and Pontoon per tile

Token.title: Token
Token.description: Tokens are accepted by all Merchants

OneShot1.title: One Shot Common
OneShot1.description: Sniper Monkeys attack 2x slower, but have a 1 in 5 chance to Crit for 10x damage. Adds a 1-1-0 Sniper Monkey to your Party

OneShot2.title: One Shot Rare
OneShot2.description: Sniper Monkeys attack 2x slower, but have a 1 in 5 chance to Crit for 14x damage. Adds a 2-1-0 Sniper Monkey to your Party

OneShot3.title: One Shot Legendary
OneShot3.description: Sniper Monkeys attack 2x slower, but have a 1 in 5 chance to Crit for 20x damage. Adds a 2-0-0 Sniper Monkey to your Party

OverwhelmingSynergy1.title: Overwhelming Synergy Common
OverwhelmingSynergy1.description: Magic Monkeys get +15% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

OverwhelmingSynergy2.title: Overwhelming Synergy Rare
OverwhelmingSynergy2.description: Magic Monkeys get +25% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

OverwhelmingSynergy3.title: Overwhelming Synergy Legendary
OverwhelmingSynergy3.description: Magic Monkeys get +40% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

PincushionFlyby1.title: Pincushion Flyby Common
PincushionFlyby1.description: Monkey Ace pin Bloons for 1s on pop, and have +10% pierce. Adds a 0-1-1 Monkey Ace to your Party

PincushionFlyby2.title: Pincushion Flyby Rare
PincushionFlyby2.description: Monkey Ace pin Bloons for 1s on pop, and have +15% pierce. Adds a 0-1-2 Monkey Ace to your Party

PincushionFlyby3.title: Pincushion Flyby Legendary
PincushionFlyby3.description: Monkey Ace pin Bloons for 1s on pop, and have +25% pierce. Adds a 0-0-2 Monkey Ace to your Party

PopsFired1.title: Pops Fired Common
PopsFired1.description: When a Bloon on fire is popped, it explodes. Hits up to 2 nearby Bloons

PopsFired2.title: Pops Fired Rare
PopsFired2.description: When a Bloon on fire is popped, it explodes. Hits up to 3 nearby Bloons

PopsFired3.title: Pops Fired Legendary
PopsFired3.description: When a Bloon on fire is popped, it explodes. Hits up to 5 nearby Bloons

PrimarySpecialist1.title: Primary Specialist Rare
PrimarySpecialist1.description: Primary Monkey attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 20%. All other Monkey categories have pierce and ability cooldown speed reduced 15%

PrimarySpecialist2.title: Primary Specialist Legendary
PrimarySpecialist2.description: Primary Monkey attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 35%. All other Monkey categories have pierce and ability cooldown speed reduced 15%

PureDamage1.title: Pure Damage Common
PureDamage1.description: Magic Monkeys attack speed and ability cooldowns are 2x slower, but damage is increased by 230% against Ceramic and MOAB-Class Bloons

PureDamage2.title: Pure Damage Rare
PureDamage2.description: Magic Monkeys attack speed and ability cooldowns are 2x slower, but damage is increased by 250% against Ceramic and MOAB-Class Bloons

PureDamage3.title: Pure Damage Legendary
PureDamage3.description: Magic Monkeys attack speed and ability cooldowns are 2x slower, but damage is increased by 300% against Ceramic and MOAB-Class Bloons

RubberBullets1.title: Rubber Bullets Rare
RubberBullets1.description: Tier 4 and higher Sniper Monkeys only deal 1 damage per shot, but immobilize MOAB-Class Bloons briefly with each hit. Adds a 0-0-0 Sniper Monkey to your Party

SlippedOnThePeel1.title: Slipped on the Peel Common
SlippedOnThePeel1.description: Benjamin and the Banana Farms slow Bloons in radius by 15%. Benjamin's range is doubled. Adds a 1-0-1 Banana Farm to your Party

SlippedOnThePeel2.title: Slipped on the Peel Rare
SlippedOnThePeel2.description: Benjamin and the Banana Farms slow Bloons in radius by 20%. Benjamin's range is doubled. Adds a 2-0-1 Banana Farm to your Party

SlippedOnThePeel3.title: Slipped on the Peel Legendary
SlippedOnThePeel3.description: Benjamin and the Banana Farms slow Bloons in radius by 30%. Benjamin's range is doubled. Adds a 2-0-0 Banana Farm to your Party

SlowAndSteady1.title: Slow And Steady Common
SlowAndSteady1.description: Monkey damage increased 100%. For the first 20s of each round, all Monkeys attack 2x slower

SlowAndSteady2.title: Slow And Steady Rare
SlowAndSteady2.description: Monkey damage increased 100%. For the first 20s of each round, all Monkeys attack 1.8x slower

SlowAndSteady3.title: Slow And Steady Legendary
SlowAndSteady3.description: Monkey damage increased 100%. For the first 20s of each round, all Monkeys attack 1.5x slower

SlowerIsHarder1.title: Slower Is Harder Common
SlowerIsHarder1.description: All projectile speed is reduced 35%, but damage increased by 15%

SlowerIsHarder2.title: Slower Is Harder Rare
SlowerIsHarder2.description: All projectile speed is reduced 35%, but damage increased by 20%

SlowerIsHarder3.title: Slower Is Harder Legendary
SlowerIsHarder3.description: All projectile speed is reduced 35%, but damage increased by 30%

SpiritOfAdventure1.title: Spirit of Adventure Common
SpiritOfAdventure1.description: Hero end of round XP increased 45% and Hero attack speed increased 10%. Non-Hero Monkeys attack speed reduced 10%

SpiritOfAdventure2.title: Spirit of Adventure Rare
SpiritOfAdventure2.description: Hero end of round XP increased 60% and Hero attack speed increased 10%. Non-Hero Monkeys attack speed reduced 10%

SpiritOfAdventure3.title: Spirit of Adventure Legendary
SpiritOfAdventure3.description: Hero end of round XP increased 80% and Hero attack speed increased 10%. Non-Hero Monkeys attack speed reduced 10%

SplodeyDarts1.title: Splody Darts Common
SplodeyDarts1.description: Dart based Monkeys' projectiles have a 20% chance to explode when they expire, dealing 1 damage to nearby Bloons

SplodeyDarts2.title: Splody Darts Rare
SplodeyDarts2.description: Dart based Monkeys' projectiles have a 20% chance to explode when they expire, dealing 3 damage to nearby Bloons

SplodeyDarts3.title: Splody Darts Legendary
SplodeyDarts3.description: Dart based Monkeys' projectiles have a 20% chance to explode when they expire, dealing 9 damage to nearby Bloons

SquadronTogether1.title: Squadron Together Strong Common
SquadronTogether1.description: Military Monkeys get +15% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

SquadronTogether2.title: Squadron Together Strong Rare
SquadronTogether2.description: Military Monkeys get +25% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

SquadronTogether3.title: Squadron Together Strong Legendary
SquadronTogether3.description: Military Monkeys get +40% attack speed. Upgrades for other Monkeys are 20% more expensive

StartingStrong1.title: Starting Strong Common
StartingStrong1.description: For the first 20s of each round, Monkeys attack 15% faster

StartingStrong2.title: Starting Strong Rare
StartingStrong2.description: For the first 20s of each round, Monkeys attack 20% faster

StartingStrong3.title: Starting Strong Legendary
StartingStrong3.description: For the first 20s of each round, Monkeys attack 35% faster

StickySituation1.title: Sticky Situation Common
StickySituation1.description: Primary Monkeys deal 1.5x damage to glued Bloons

StickySituation2.title: Sticky Situation Rare
StickySituation2.description: Primary Monkeys deal 1.75x damage to glued Bloons

StickySituation3.title: Sticky Situation Legendary
StickySituation3.description: Primary Monkeys deal 2x damage to glued Bloons

SupportSpecialist1.title: Support Specialist Rare
SupportSpecialist1.description: Support Monkeys attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 20%. All other Monkey categories have pierce and ability cooldown speed reduced 15%

SupportSpecialist2.title: Support Specialist Legendary
SupportSpecialist2.description: Support Monkeys attack reload time and ability cooldowns are reduced 35%. All other Monkey categories have pierce and ability cooldown speed reduced 15%

SwellingSpikes1.title: Swelling Spikes Common
SwellingSpikes1.description: Spike Factories attack half as fast, but have 115% more pierce. Adds a 1-0-1 Spike Factory to your Party

SwellingSpikes2.title: Swelling Spikes Rare
SwellingSpikes2.description: Spike Factories attack half as fast, but have 120% more pierce. Adds a 2-0-1 Spike Factory to your Party

SwellingSpikes3.title: Swelling Spikes Legendary
SwellingSpikes3.description: Spike Factories attack half as fast, but have 135% more pierce. Adds a 2-0-0 Spike Factory to your Party

SwiftestToBusiness1.title: Swiftest To Business Common
SwiftestToBusiness1.description: Ninja Monkeys tier 3 or higher have 20% faster projectile speed, and attack reload and ability cooldown time reduced 20%. Adds a 1-0-1 Ninja Monkey to your Party

SwiftestToBusiness2.title: Swiftest To Business Rare
SwiftestToBusiness2.description: Ninja Monkeys tier 3 or higher have 25% faster projectile speed, and attack reload and ability cooldown time reduced 25%. Adds a 2-0-1 Ninja Monkey to your Party

SwiftestToBusiness3.title: Swiftest To Business Legendary
SwiftestToBusiness3.description: Ninja Monkeys tier 3 or higher have 40% faster projectile speed, and attack reload and ability cooldown time reduced 40%. Adds a 2-0-0 Ninja Monkey to your Party

TheUnspokenHeroes1.title: The Unspoken Heroes Common
TheUnspokenHeroes1.description: Support Monkeys have a 1 in 10 chance to Crit for 250% damage. Heroes attack speed and end of round experience is reduced 15%

TheUnspokenHeroes2.title: The Unspoken Heroes Rare
TheUnspokenHeroes2.description: Support Monkeys have a 1 in 10 chance to Crit for 350% damage. Heroes attack speed and end of round experience is reduced 15%

TheUnspokenHeroes3.title: The Unspoken Heroes Legendary
TheUnspokenHeroes3.description: Support Monkeys have a 1 in 10 chance to Crit for 500% damage. Heroes attack speed and end of round experience is reduced 15%

TitForTat1.title: Tit For Tat Common
TitForTat1.description: All Monkeys attack 15% faster. Bloons move 25% faster when in range of Monkeys

TitForTat2.title: Tit For Tat Rare
TitForTat2.description: All Monkeys attack 20% faster. Bloons move 25% faster when in range of Monkeys

TitForTat3.title: Tit For Tat Legendary
TitForTat3.description: All Monkeys attack 40% faster. Bloons move 25% faster when in range of Monkeys

TooManyCooks1.title: Too Many Cooks Common
TooManyCooks1.description: Military Monkeys attack reload time is reduced 25%. Attack reload time increased by 5% for each Military Monkey placed

TooManyCooks2.title: Too Many Cooks Rare
TooManyCooks2.description: Military Monkeys attack reload time is reduced 30%. Attack reload time increased by 5% for each Military Monkey placed

TooManyCooks3.title: Too Many Cooks Legendary
TooManyCooks3.description: Military Monkeys attack reload time is reduced 45%. Attack reload time increased by 5% for each Military Monkey placed

TrickShotATacks1.title: Trick Shot A-Tacks Common
TrickShotATacks1.description: Tack Shooter projectiles rebound off obstacles. Range and projectile lifespan increased 50%. Adds a 1-1-0 Tack Shooter to your Party

TrickShotATacks2.title: Trick Shot A-Tacks Rare
TrickShotATacks2.description: Tack Shooter projectiles rebound off obstacles. Range and projectile lifespan increased 100%. Adds a 1-2-0 Tack Shooter to your Party

TrickShotATacks3.title: Trick Shot A-Tacks Legendary
TrickShotATacks3.description: Tack Shooter projectiles rebound off obstacles. Range and projectile lifespan increased 200%. Adds a 0-2-0 Tack Shooter to your Party

Unification1.title: Unification Common
Unification1.description: Primary Monkeys now count as all Monkey categories. Primary Monkey attack range reduced 20%

Unification2.title: Unification Rare
Unification2.description: Primary Monkeys now count as all Monkey categories. Primary Monkey attack range reduced 10%

Unification3.title: Unification Legendary
Unification3.description: Primary Monkeys now count as all Monkey categories.

Wackywibblywavey1.title: Wacky Wibbly Wavey Common
Wackywibblywavey1.description: Heli Pilot attack reload time is reduced 20% and fire in a wacky wiggly pattern. Adds a 1-1-0 Heli Pilot to your Party

Wackywibblywavey2.title: Wacky Wibbly Wavey Rare
Wackywibblywavey2.description: Heli Pilot attack reload time is reduced 25% and fire in a wacky wiggly pattern. Adds a 2-1-0 Heli Pilot to your Party

Wackywibblywavey3.title: Wacky Wibbly Wavey Legendary
Wackywibblywavey3.description: Heli Pilot attack reload time is reduced 40% and fire in a wacky wiggly pattern. Adds a 2-0-0 Heli Pilot to your Party

ZigThenZag1.title: Zig Then Zag Common
ZigThenZag1.description: All Military Monkeys shoot in a Zig Zag pattern. Projectiles move 20% slower, but attack speed is 20% faster

ZigThenZag2.title: Zig Then Zag Rare
ZigThenZag2.description: All Military Monkeys shoot in a Zig Zag pattern. Projectiles move 20% slower, but attack speed is 25% faster

ZigThenZag3.title: Zig Then Zag Legendary
ZigThenZag3.description: All Military Monkeys shoot in a Zig Zag pattern. Projectiles move 20% slower, but attack speed is 40% faster
